attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hunting was rightly banned in 2004, however a vociferous hunting community continues to call for the repeal of the act. We believe that the Hunting Act of 2004 was a timely and appropriate piece of legislation and wish it to remain in place.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Not repeal the Hunting Act 2004."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11369.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/notohunting/
